dcterms:creator: S. Bakas
B. H. Menze
A. A. Silva
M. Reyes
R. Meier
V. Alves
dcterms:description: The BRATS 2017 Training set is used for evaluating automatic brain tumor grading from MRI data, organized according to tumor grade into high grade gliomas (HGG) and low grade gliomas (LGG). It includes 285 pre-operative acquisitions with 4 MRI sequences available for each subject.
dcterms:title: BRATS 2017 Training set

dcterms:creator: B. H. Menze
S. Bakas
A. A. Silva
M. Reyes
R. Meier
V. Alves
dcterms:description: The BRATS (Multimodal Brain Tumor Image Segmentation Benchmark) dataset is utilized for benchmarking segmentation algorithms in brain tumor imaging, providing a comprehensive set of multimodal MRI data.
dcterms:title: BRATS (Multimodal Brain Tumor Image Segmentation Benchmark)
